source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_00<tab>Swozblaet, the master merchant of Hawkers' Alley, wants you to look into current market prices.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_00<tab>国際街商通りの責任者スヴォズブレートは、市場の価格調査を依頼したいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_01<tab>Swozblaet has bid you pose as a customer and glance over the wares being sold by Iron Thunder, Kyokyoroon, and Syneyhil. Strike up a conversation with the three merchants, and surreptitiously record the prices of their goods.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_01<tab>国際街商通りの責任者スヴォズブレートから市場の不正取引を監視するため、売買価格の覆面調査を依頼された。「防具屋　アイアンサンダー」、「キョキョルン」、「道具屋　シンエイヒル」に話しかけ、そのすきに価格を調査しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_02<tab>You have completed your survey of market prices. Deliver the price list to Baensyng on West Hawkers' Alley.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_02<tab>価格調査を終えた。西国際街商通りにいる「べーンシング」に「市場価格調査書」を手渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_03<tab>You have delivered your report to Baensyng. According to the prices you recorded, the markets seem free of any shady dealings for another day.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SEQ_03<tab>べーンシングに調査結果を報告した。港町らしく、様々な人間が行き交っていた。
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_TODO_00<tab>防具屋　アイアンサンダーに話しかけて価格調査
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_TODO_01<tab>キョキョルンに話しかけて価格調査
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_TODO_02<tab>道具屋　シンエイヒルに話しかけて価格調査

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the price list to Baensyng.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_TODO_03<tab>べーンシングに市場価格調査書を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_0<tab>You, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>─adventurer. I have work for you. I would have you pose as a customer and survey the market's current prices.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_0あんたに、ひとつ手伝ってほしいことがある。
客のフリして、市場の価格調査をしてほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_1<tab>Surely I did not see you balk at so simple a task? All you need do is strike up a conversation with the shop owners, and glance over their wares.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_1なに、難しい仕事じゃねえ。
店主と雑談してるスキに
商品の種類と値段を調べて、報告してくれりゃいいさ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_2<tab>There are three merchants that interest me: Iron Thunder, Kyokyoroon, and Syneyhil.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_2調べてほしいのは、「防具屋　アイアンサンダー」
キキルン族の商人「キョキョルン」、
「道具屋　シンエイヒル」の3人だ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_3<tab>Write down all you see on this price list, and hand it to Baensyng on West Hawkers' Alley. He shall reward you for your service.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SWOZBLAET_000_3調査結果を、この「市場価格調査書」に書き込んで
西国際街商通りにいる「べーンシング」に渡してくれ。
報酬を渡すように、言っておくからよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_IRONTHUNDER_000_10<tab>Well met, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! Cast your peepers over these beauties! Not a spot of rust to be found! Every piece fresh from the forges of Naldiq & Vymelli's!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_IRONTHUNDER_000_10いらっしゃい、うちで取り扱う商品は、
ナルディク＆ヴィメリー社謹製のまっさらな新品ですよ！
中古は扱ってませんから、安心してくださいねっ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_KYOKYOROON_000_20<tab>Kyokyoroon welcomes well-come customer! Kyokyoroon loves his lovely trade! Kyokyoroon's goods are goodly made!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_KYOKYOROON_000_20お客ちゃん、いらっしゃい。
キョキョルン、しょーばい、たのしいっちゃ！
キョキョルン、いっぱい、さーびすっちゃ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SYNEYHIL_000_30<tab>A fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. What can I interest you in t─ Why, you seem interested in most everything, don't you? Is this another one of those investigations!? Well, I have nothing to hide!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_SYNEYHIL_000_30いらっしゃい……と、見かけない顔だね？
あんた、まさか市場の覆面調査員じゃないだろうね？
やめてくれ、うちはおかしな品物なんか扱っちゃいないよ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_40<tab>Yer the one what made a list for Swozblaet? Let's 'ave it, then.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_40おや、今回は、あなたが調査をしてくれたのかい？
どれどれ、さっそく「市場価格調査書」を見せてくれ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_41<tab>Mmm, nothin' wrong with the markets, far as I can tell.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_41ふむふむ、あなたの報告によると、
今回の価格は、波風なさそうだな。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_42<tab>Ye ofttimes get pirates sellin' stolen goods at cutthroat prices, an' that drives the numbers down right across 'Awkers' Alley. Thanks to these reports, though, we can tell at a glance when shady dealin's are takin' place. Good work, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA004_00114_BAENSYNG_000_42海賊による略奪品が市場に流れ込むと、
市場価格が急激に下がったりするからね。
こうして日頃から、価格を調べてんのさ！
